title: The Director
brief_description: Director Don Weis bears the responsibility of supervising every aspect of putting a film together. His talent must encompass acting, camera work, special effects, music, costumes, make-up, scripts, editing and budgeting. This film places the viewer beside a skilful director as he gives shape to a major Hollywood production. Features Robert Wagner in acting role.
